mapper.insert: insert into members(email, name, password, photo) values(#{email}, #{name}, sha2(#{password}, 256), #{photo})
mapper.select: select member_no, email, name, photo, join_date from members where member_no = #{no}
select member_no, email, name, photo, join_date from members where email = #{email} and password = sha2(#{password}, 256)
select member_no, email, name, photo, join_date from members order by member_no desc
